quotes.quote: Never settle for anything less than you want.
Never settle for being a character in someone else'Â’s story when you are meant to be the author of your own.
If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.
When you accept the fact that your true identity includes being an overcomer, you will never settle for less than a miracle.
Don't ever settle for less than you deserve, because once you start to settle you always will.
Know your worth. Know the difference between what you're getting and what you deserve.
Never settle with words what you can accomplish with a flame-thrower.
Never settle for anything less than your best.
Don't rush and never settle. If it's meant to be, it will be.
One key to success is demanding more than adequacy, never settling for good enough and always doing a little bit more.
Never settle for less than your dreams, somewhere, sometime, someday, somehow, you'll find them.
When you refuse to settle for less than the best...the best tends to track you down.
The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
Never settle. There is no need to rush.
Be awesome. Live life to the fullest. Shoot for the stars and never settle.
If you're gonna settle for anything; settle for greatness.
Never settle for anything less than extraordinary.
Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
Never settle for the crumbs of life.
Never settle on a life you don't want when God is trying to give you a better life.
Life is too short to settle for something less than spectacular.
Never settle for average.
Never settle for that which is easy and comfortable or the necessity of seeking that which is difficult and uncomfortable.
Never settle for less than you deserve. Demand the best, accept nothing less.
Never settle for the path of least resistance.
If you settle for what you've got, you deserve what you get.
If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
Ten years from now, make sure you can say that you CHOSE your life, you didn't SETTLE for it.
Don't settle, as with all matters of the heart you'll know when you find it
